title: Mark Cavendish’s 3x Tour de France stage winning Specialized S-Works Tarmac SL7
content:
Can we just take a quick moment to appreciate the renaissance of super sprinter Mark Cavendish at this year’s Tour de France, and take a look at the subtle green highlights to his multi-stage winning Specialized S-Works Tarmac SL7? While we’ve covered plenty of Cavendish-related tech over the years, some flashy & some subdued, it’s […]

The post Mark Cavendish’s 3x Tour de France stage winning Specialized S-Works Tarmac SL7 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
